alert.note: Alert for Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; Eastern Toole and Liberty; Hill County; Northern Blaine County; Western and Central Chouteau County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 24 at 9:55PM MST until December 25 at 8:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Blowing and drifting snow expected. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph at times. * WHERE...Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine, Eastern Toole and Liberty, Hill County, Northern Blaine County and Western and Central Chouteau County. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Blowing and drifting snow may cause partial lane blockages and slippery spots on area roads. Periods of reduced Visibility as low as a quarter mile possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Though currently not expected, if ground blizzard conditions develop an upgrade the Winter Weather Advisory will be upgraded to a Blizzard Warning. In addition, a brief period of rain, freezing rain, sleet, or snow may occur this evening and cause some minor travel difficulties before strong winds develop.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; Eastern Toole and Liberty; Hill County; Northern Blaine County; Western and Central Chouteau County
